paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Demonstrated to have an in vitro electrophysiological effect compatible with LQTS.

variants.segregation_data: Found in 5 unrelated families, indicating potential founder effect.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on functional data and absence in controls.
variants.additional_notes: Considered disease-causing based on evolutionary conservation and absence in controls.
key_quotes: A large founder family with p.F29L in KCNH2 was identified.
Only one of these missense mutations, p.F29L, had been demonstrated to have an in vitro electrophysiological effect compatible with LQTS.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on absence in controls.
variants.additional_notes: Considered disease-causing based on evolutionary conservation and absence in controls.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
